title: Timetable adjustments on the Bendigo line
articleContent:
From Sunday 11 July 2021, the 6.22am Eaglehawk to Southern Cross weekday service will depart two minutes earlier at 6.20am and stop at Sunbury at 7.48am.

View the new timetable for Eaglehawk to Southern Cross Station

The weekday V/Line coach timetables for Daylesford to Woodend and Maryborough to Castlemaine will also change to maintain reliable connections with the adjusted train timetable.

View the new timetable for V/Line coach services

To plan your journey, visit the Journey planner or order a printed copy of a timetable by calling 1800 800 007.
